attributes.action: To stop the demolition and redevelopment of Clarence Terrace Car Park/ Ex South Wales bus garage
attributes.additional_details:
Swansea City Centre for the Swansea Bus Museum To House Vehicles(8)(after repairs to building) for the use at the Quadrant Bus Station to provide bus services to first cwmru and Swansea City to brighten up the city and maintain heritage.
Specific routes will be chosen and delegated.
Clarence Terrace will not be a workshop so no noise pollution apart from the buses that will be taken out of Clarence terrace in the morning used by Swansea City and  put back early evening
